thread.title: Shawn Olmstead
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Shawn Olmstead

author: Shawn Olmstead
title: Shawn Olmstead
text: As first time home buyer, this was an extremely stressful process. Steve and Emma at Premium Mortgage made our purchase as smooth as possible. They provided great communication and guidance throughout this processes. If we decide to buy again, there is no doubt we'll be contacting Premium Mortage.
